pageProduct.name: Swisse Body Wash For Men 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Body Wash For Men thoroughly cleans the skin while maintaining hydration. Created with a blend of Cedarwood Oil, Rosemary Leaf Oil and Lemon Peel Oil, it invigorates the skin and the senses.

Warnings

This product contains essential oils. Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner. Store below 28°C

Common Uses

Thoroughly cleans the skin while maintaining hydration.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua) Cocamidopropyl Betaine Glycerin (Plant Derived) Coco-Glucoside Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate Xanthan Gum Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil Vetiveria Zizanoides Root Oil Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil Juniperus Virginiana Wood Oil Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil Abies Sibirica (Siberian Fir) Oil Mentha Spicata Herb Oil Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder Citric Acid Dehydroacetic Acid Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

In the shower, lather all over body, then rinse thoroughly. Use daily.
